title: Bank lending to NBFCs slows, growth halves over last year
description: RBI data reveals a slowdown in bank credit to non-banking financing companies, with growth halving compared to last year. Outstanding credit exposure stood at Rs 15.3 lakh crore in July 2024. Personal loans also saw slower growth, influenced by regulatory measures and market conditions, signaling a potential moderation in overall credit offtake for FY25.
